column4: Hello,, when hubuntu startsup i it runs a checkdisk then it tells me it had some error's,to press ctrl d or enter roots password,,, the thing is that at that point the keuyboard doesnt work..
have you tried booting into the safe mode thingie in grub?
then I'd get out a liveCD and fsck the drive with that
im in ecuador and i dont have a boot cd
and i need some documents from that partition
there is got to be an way to get around it
are you using a ps2 keyboard?
ah...can you attach a keyboard to it?
That's about all I can think of
I don't really know, I'm just throwing ideas out, what I would try :-/
